inviteuppers-explaination: Obviously you need people with the right skills and motivation to get job done. We give you ten uppers that match you and your part-up best. We base our suggestions upon the analysis of all of your part-up's content and all upper profiles. No match found? No worries, you can always look for matches yourself.
inviteuppers-popup-title: Invite people to join your part-up
inviteuppers-popup-explaination: You might want to work with someone you know, but who is not an upper yet. Here you can invite them to become upper and join your part-up. We drafted an invitation email for you. Add your personal note and send it!
